Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the extent of the injuries suffered by the Indian army after the China face-off.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the Indian army was injured after the recent China face-off.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the injuries suffered by the Indian army were caused by the China face-off, without providing concrete evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations for the injuries suffered by the Indian army, other than the China face-off, which are not explored in the claim.
